title: Four Takeaways From the DeSantis-Crist Debate in Floridaâ€™s Governor Race
description: Charlie Crist was eager to focus on abortion rights, while Gov. Ron DeSantis often turned his attention to President Biden.
dc:creator: Patricia Mazzei and Maggie Astor
media:credit: Pool photo by Crystal Vander Weit
media:description: Gov. Ron DeSantis and Charlie Crist debated on Monday night in Fort Pierce, Fla., an event that was postponed earlier in the month after Hurricane Ian struck the state.
